query: 如图的△ABC中有一正方形DEFG,其中D在AC上,E、F在AB上,直线AG分别交DE、BC于M、N两点．若∠B=90°,AB=4,BC=3,EF=1,则BN的长度为何？()选项：['\\frac{4}{3}', '\\frac{3}{2}', '\\frac{8}{5}', '\\frac{12}{7}']
answer: 解:∵四边形DEFG是正方形,∴DE∥BC,GF∥BN,且DE=GF=EF=1,∴△ADE∽△ACB,△AGF∽△ANB,∴\frac{AE}{AB}=\frac{DE}{BC}①,\frac{AE+EF}{AB}=\frac{GF}{BN}②,由①可得,\frac{AE}{4}=\frac{1}{3},解得:AE=\frac{4}{3},将AE=\frac{4}{3}代入②,得:\frac{\frac{4}{3}+1}{4}=\frac{1}{BN},解得:BN=\frac{12}{7},故选:D．
